longBusinessSummary: Santander Bank Polska S.A. provides various banking products and services for individuals, small or medium-sized enterprises, corporate clients, and public sector institutions. It offers personal account, deposits and currencies, internet and mobile banking, and mobile contactless payments, and credit solutions. The company also provides investment advisory, structured deposits, structured certificates and bonds, and brokerage services. In addition, the company offers accounts, business loans, credits, cards and payment terminals, deposits and investments, foreign trade, financial markets, leasing, and internet banking services. Further, the company offers transaction handling, liquidity management, export, import, domestic, and foreign guarantees, working capital finance, current, and investment financing services. Additionally, the company provides foreign exchange, hedging financial risk, correspondence banking, trade finance, and trust services, as well as solutions for financial institutions and global banking transactions. Furthermore, it offers debt and rating advisory and capital market and debt capital services. The company was founded in 1857 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland. Santander Bank Polska S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Banco Santander, S.A.
